attributes.action: Force Flybe to make at least one flight leave on time from Gatwick to Newquay
attributes.background: Flybe changed the service in March and the flight home from Gatwick to Newquay in the evening hasn't left on time for 4 months. They seem completely unable to fix the issue. They are the only carrier on this route with no competition and as a result seem happy to provide this level of service

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Flybe, not the Government or Parliament.
